form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Ayotte introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To make the moratorium on Internet access taxes and multiple and discriminatory taxes on electronic commerce permanent.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Permanent Internet Tax Freedom Act of 2013.

section.header: Permanent moratorium on Internet access taxes and multiple and discriminatory taxes on electronic commerce

subsection.text: Section 1101(a) of the Internet Tax Freedom Act (47 U.S.C. 151 note) is amended by striking taxes during the period beginning November 1, 2003, and ending November 1, 2014: and inserting taxes:.
The amendment made by this section shall apply to taxes imposed after the date of the enactment of this Act.
